sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SALIANT, in Fortification, denotes projecting. There are two kinds of angles ; the one saliant, which have their points outwards ; the other re-entering, which have their points inwards.
Saliant, Sament, or Saillant, in Heraldry, is applied to a lion, or other beast, when its tore-legs are raised in a leaping posture.
